Class PreferencesBusiness

java.lang.Object
ch.supsi.business.preferences.PreferencesBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreferencesBusinessInterface
public class PreferencesBusiness extends Object implements PreferencesBusinessInterface
Provides business logic for managing user preferences in the application. This class interacts with the data access layer to retrieve and store preferences, including the current language setting and other key-value preferences. Implements the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance is used across the application.

    • setCurrentLanguage

      public void setCurrentLanguage(String languageCode) throws IOException
      Sets the current language preference for the application.
      Specified by:
      setCurrentLanguage in interface PreferencesBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      languageCode - the language code (e.g., "en", "it") to set as the current language
      Throws:

    • getPreference

      public Optional<Object> getPreference(String key)
      Retrieves the preference associated with the specified key.
      Specified by:
      getPreference in interface PreferencesBusinessInterface
      Parameters:
      key - the key for the desired preference
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the preference value if found, or empty if the key is invalid or not present

    • setPreference

      Sets a preference in the application by storing the specified key-value pair.

      Parameters:
      preference - the key-value pair representing the preference to store
      Throws:
